name: Egyptian Museum Adventure 3D
description:
Classic 3D game "Escape Room: Egyptian Museum Adventure" is coming ...

All new 3D Egyptian tomb escape, let you discover and adventure, all kinds of Egyptian elements make you amazed.

A lot of 3D puzzle, Make you keep think, observe, judge, calculate, try to escape ...

Humanized hints,when the key moment helps you, help you escape successfully.

If you love puzzle games, you will not miss such a wonderful challenge.

Wonderful Egyptian tomb adventure, Start now ...
